Package index

Dropout imputation

Refining the lineage barcodes data with stochastic dropout

barcodes_grouping()
Group label barcodes (For imputation)
lable_imputation()
Impute label barcodes
remaining_sites_imputation()
Impute remaining sites
stochastic_dropout()
Stochastic dropout generation
dropout_imputation()
Impute stochastic dropout of lineage barcodes
dropout_imputation_alter()
Impute stochastic dropout in lineage barcodes

Sub-cell division tree reconstruction

Reconstructing the sub-cell division tree for each state lineage

state_lineage_info()
State lineage information
nodes_clustering()
Generate a tree topology using Ward's clustering method
initial_tree_construction()
Reconstruct initial sub-cell division trees based solely on lineage barcodes
ancestor_inference()
Infer ancestral lineage barcodes and cell states
ancestor_inference_time_scale()
Infer ancestral barcodes with time scaling
state_transition_likelihood()
Calculate state shift probability for cell states
barcode_similarity_likelihood()
Calculate barcode shift probability
combined_likelihood()
Calculate combined tree score based on cell state and barcode shift scores
nodes_sampling()
Calculate the probability of each node being selected as the root for subtree exchange
subtrees_swapping()
Swap subtrees in a sub-cell division tree
subtree_refinement()
Refine sub-cell division trees based on lineage barcodes and cell states

Sub-cell division tree integration

Integrating the sub-cell division to a comprehensive cell division tree

sibling_cells_distance()
Find the distance between sibling cells
drop_non_minimum_tips()
Drop non-minimum tips from tree list
drop_duplicated_tips()
Drop duplicated leaf nodes from tree list
get_first_element()
Get first element (actually returns the second element)
subtree_root_bar()
Get root barcodes from a list of trees
get_root_barcode()
Get the root barcode from a tree
get_subtree_root_barcodes()
Get subtree root barcodes for each best subtree in a lineage
count_common_mutations()
Count common mutations between two barcodes
count_uncommon_mutations()
Count uncommon mutations between two barcodes
common_mutation_matrix()
Build a common mutation matrix between root barcodes of sub-subtrees
group_subcell_trees()
Group sub-cell division trees for merging based on common mutations
subtrees_rank()
Rank subtrees based on common mutation counts
prune_cell_tree()
Subdivide a sub-cell division tree into sub-subtrees
decompose_subtrees()
Generate sub-subtrees from best subtrees
get_subtree_celltypes()
Get subtree cell types
get_tips()
Get tip labels from a tree
get_unique_celltypes()
Get unique cell types from subtrees
merge_subcell_trees_ordered()
Merge sub-cell division trees in order based on nodes rank and weight
merge_subcell_trees_ward()
Merge sub-cell division trees using Ward's method
phylogenetic_tree()
Compute a time-scaled phylogenetic tree based on lineage barcodes

Utilities

Utility functions

hamming_distance()
Compute Hamming Distance Matrix for Barcodes
improved_hamming_distance()
Calculate improved Hamming distance between two lineage barcodes
distance_with_dropout()
Define Hamming distance between lineage barcodes with dropout (For imputation)
format_tree_newick()
Convert tree information into Newick (.nwk) format
format_tree_newick_time()
Convert tree information into Newick (.nwk) format including time information
find_node_depth()
Find the depth of a given node in a tree
